name: sc-styleurban
description: SC StyleUrban - Tienda de Ropa Online con Frontend y Backend integrados

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix sc-styleurban/frontend && npm install --prefix sc-styleurban/backend
scripts.vercel-build: npm install --prefix sc-styleurban/frontend && npm install --prefix sc-styleurban/backend && npm run build --prefix sc-styleurban/frontend

author: SC StyleUrban
